functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.

msg.content: What are the years of birth of the authors of the top 5 best-selling books?
What are the years of birth of the authors of the top 5 best-selling books?

I'm going to assume you mean the top five best-selling books of all time. These are:

- Don Quixote, by Miguel de Cervantes (1547)
- A Tale of Two Cities, by Charles Dickens (1812)
- The Little Prince, by Antoine de Saint-Exupéry (1900)
- The Lord of the Rings, by J.R.R Tolkien (1892)
- The Hobbit, by J.R.R Tolkien (1892)

I'll give you the answers in a table format.

| Book | Author | Year of birth |
|---|---|---|
| Don Quixote | Miguel de Cervantes | 1547 |
| A Tale of Two Cities | Charles Dickens | 1812 |
| The Little Prince | Antoine de Saint-Exupéry | 1900 |
| The Lord of the Rings | J.R.R Tolkien | 1892 |
| The Hobbit | J.R.R Tolkien | 1892 |
